name: Readying of Rites
effectText: Add 1 Fiend Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand, then if you added a Pendulum Monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Sacrificial Offering Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 300/DEF 300). While you control that Token, you cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck. When your Ritual Monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can banish this card from your GY; draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Readying of Rites" once per turn.
